history.proof: scongruence use: Cmult_0_r, Cmult_comm unfold: RtoC.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RtoC_mult (RtoC (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmult_0_r (_ * 0)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmult_0_l (0 * _)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment x : C Unable to unify "(0, 0) + 0 = (0, 0)" with "0 * x = 0".

original: rewrite RtoC_mult. rewrite Rmult_0_r. rewrite Rmult_0_l. apply (Cplus_0_r (0, 0)).
